main_topic.author: Michael Benton
main_topic.title: Which hardware configuration is used in scoring?
main_topic.content: I'm at a point where I'm making optimizations to get within 9hours. I just launched one that should work in time if on a p100, but won't if on one of the TPM or 2x T4. Does it automatically give you the same hardware configuration as you have set in the notebook?

comments.author: Valentin Werner
comments.content: Yep, you get what you choose during runtime.
comments.date: Posted 22 days ago  ·  38th in this Competition
